channel.title: Funny Glitch during Execution
channel.description:
#### What happened? ![FunnyGlitch|432x499](upload://yFPbig27QP7CMOpMmQmrMA63Khz.jpg)
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The people in the court were supposed to be hidden, yet they weren't hidden and I got a great image of a Smug Anime Girl staring into my soul.... Creepy.
#### Steps to reproduce: Well my game crashed right before this execution, so that could be the cause of this glitch.
#### Comments:

item.title: Funny Glitch during Execution
item.dc:creator: iioHei
item.description:
What happened?

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The people in the court were supposed to be hidden, yet they weren’t hidden and I got a great image of a Smug Anime Girl staring into my soul… Creepy.

Steps to reproduce:

Well my game crashed right before this execution, so that could be the cause of this glitch.
